website_summaries.verdict: The Mitsubishi WD-65831 may be expensive, but its standout picture quality, sleek design, and superb feature set make it worth the price to high-end buyers.
pros: Produces deep blacks with excellent shadow detail
greatly reduced "rainbow effect" compared to other DLPs
plenty of picture control including fine-tuning for color and tint
excellent connectivity with two 1080p-compatible HDMI inputs and a 1080p DVI input
very compact design for a 65-inch HDTV
cons: inaccurate primary colors and initial color decoding and grayscale
no grayscale controls in user menu

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit and lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: Second time I've bought from amazon this month. Both bulbs do not fit. The connectors are too fat. The bulb will not click in and cannot be secured. Update: I had to practically jam it in after watching a few videos. It lasted until today. I'm going to buy it one more time and if it doesn't work I'm done with this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: It works! ...and at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item very quickly... simple installation... picture looks great now... let's hope that it gets me a couple of years before burning out. :-) The price surprised me considering that I paid $300 plus shipping a couple of years ago. I was pondering the thought of getting rid of the DLP TV because this would be my 3rd lamp replacement in just under 6 years. My last projection TV lasted 14 years and never needed lamp replacement. At least this time the lamp was affordable, and now I will hold onto the TV just a tad bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Hojohowitz

customer_reviews.title: Lasting less and less
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks then stopped working!everytime i buy a new one is last less and less time . use to last 2 years, then 1 year. Now 2 weeks . and bulbs are more expensive and last less time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Premature Failure
customer_reviews.text: Lamp failed within 4 weeks ( @~3hrs/day) of use but supplier replaced it quickly. We'll have to see how long the replacement lasts as maybe this was very unusual.
customer_reviews.author: scubar

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long term use
customer_reviews.text: Bulb only lasted 5 months. Update. New build ordered on March 31, 2017. Installed when arrived and it died today, May 5, 2017. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. Generic to the point of being no good. Screws too short to connect lamp to tv. And I ordered using CORRECT model number.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Major disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: It was bright and clear for 3 days and then it quit. Major disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: MickyS

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in February and it has already stopped working... I believe it was defected because I know the TV hours was not being used as much so it shouldnt have went out so quick.
customer_reviews.author: Rikishahawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Right bulb. But did not fit in tv. Couldn't figure out why it wasn't fitting. Took it to a technician and still didn't work. Shortly after we tried to rig it and messed up the housing now we can't return it and was a waste of time and money. I wouldn't purchase this if I was you. I've never had any trouble replacing tv bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is our primary TV and is on most of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our primary TV and is on most of the time. I just ordered two more bulbs. having done same about a year ago. The first bulb I ordered lasted just short of a year, but for less than $30 each, if it extends my 2006 Mitsubishi Projection DLP TV for a few more year's, I will gladly replace a bulb annually. The quality of the picture is still remarkable and beats spending $1,500 + on a 60" replacement TV.
customer_reviews.author: Craig R. Showalter

customer_reviews.title: Works great and a great price
customer_reviews.text: The fit was a little tight, I had to really force the light in. But it was exactly the same as the bulb I took out... same part number and everything. Works great and a great price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: ... new TV lamp came in on time and was easy to installed into my Mitsubishi TV
customer_reviews.text: My new TV lamp came in on time and was easy to installed into my Mitsubishi TV. No problems here with this replacement product.
customer_reviews.author: David Cummins

customer_reviews.title: total garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit right ... plugged it on and the TV power button is flashing YELLOW ... total garbage !
customer_reviews.author: Animation Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Not an exact replacement model
customer_reviews.text: Item was not an exact duplicate. It has 2 small fins that I had to sand down to enable the housing to fit into the TV chassis.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The Projector Lamps arrived very quickly; about 3 days after ordering. Installation instructions were included in the box. Very easy to follow. The lamp produced a slight odor as all new lamps do during burn-in. The picture brightness was great and very clear. Watched a 2 Hr movie after installing the bulb with no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: didn't last
customer_reviews.text: This is used in my bedroom tv and only gets used at most a couple hrs a night and it lasted almost exactly a year
customer_reviews.author: teal

customer_reviews.title: The return process was easy, however 2 weeks later and now the replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: We recieved our bulb and discovered that it was defective. The return process was easy, however 2 weeks later and now the replacement is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pait

customer_reviews.title: brought the first bulb and it went out within 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: brought the first bulb and it went out within 2 weeks. Was issued another light bulb and worked only 2 months. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: sulie canales

customer_reviews.title: works great for the $$$$$
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. picture looks great. For the price I was skeptical but have had it installed for a while now with heavy use and its still working geat
customer_reviews.author: dan rosynek

customer_reviews.title: It was was great! The delivery got here fast
customer_reviews.text: It was was great! The delivery got here fast, and worked 100% !! Definitely recommend their product ! :) thank you :3
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Quezada

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with the purchase Do not use the big screen that much to really test it Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: john

product_meta.title: Mitsubishi WD-65831 Rear Projector TV lamp with housing Replacement lamp
product_meta.description: This Shopforbattery part number SFP-167_122864 is the premium RPTV lamp that is designed and manufactured for Mitsubishi WD-65831 replacement TV lamp . This TV lamp is a brand new lamp with New housing and already been tested to be 100% OEM compatible. It is difference from other sellers that only sell the bare lamp or bare bulb. This Mitsubishi WD-65831 replacement TV lamp tv lamp is made in Taiwan and comes with 90 days warranty. All lamps are tested before leaving the manufacturer to ensure the best quality of the lamp.

Brand new lamp with new housing. It is NOT just the bare lamp or bare bulb.
Made in Taiwan and with huge inventory in US to ensure fast shipping
All lamps are tested at the manufacturer before leaving the facility
